attributes.action: TO REDUCE ROADS BEING CLOGGED UP WITH PARKED CARS - HOUSEHOLDS SHOULD BE FORCED WHERE THEY CAN OFF THE ROADS ONTO THERE LAND.
attributes.additional_details: WE THE UNDERSIGNED WOULD LIKE TO SEE LAWS TO TAKE PARKED TRAFFIC FROM OUR ROADS WHERE PEOPLE ARE TO LAZY TO PARK IN THERE OWN DRIVEWAYS AND LAND, OUR ROADS ARE GETTING VERY CLOGGED UP WITH NOT JUST ISSUES WITH EMERGENCY SERVICES BUT NORMAL TRAFFIC TRYING TO GET THROUGH, THERE ARE MANY CASES WHERE PEOPLE ALTHOUGH AN EMPTY DRIVE PARK IN THE ROAD, NOBODY HAS A RIGHT TO PARK ON THE HIGHWAY BUT ARE ALOUD TO AT THIS TIME, WRONG LETS CLEAR ROADS WHERE WE CAN BY LAW.
